name: Super Crush KO
detailed_description:
Super Crush KO is a fast-paced brawler set in a vibrant, near-future city. Zip up your favourite neon jacket and combo your way through swarms of deadly robots to save your kidnapped kitten and, while you’re at it, save humanity from an AI apocalypse.

  • Lightning-fast gameplay that seamlessly blends run n' gun action and intense beat-em-up combat
  • Launch, juggle, and shoot waves of robots out of the sky in sprawling, fluid, easy-to-execute combos
  • Crush your way from enemy to enemy with ground attacks, aerial attacks, bullets and even super moves that keep your score climbing
  • Explore a beautiful, vibrant world inspired by colourful urban cityscapes and pastel skylines
  • Online leaderboards and ranking systems will keep you coming back to S-Rank dozens of levels

short_description: Super Crush KO is a fast-paced brawler set in a vibrant, near-future city. Zip up your favourite neon jacket and combo your way through swarms of deadly robots to save your kidnapped kitten and, while you’re at it, save humanity from an AI apocalypse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (SP3)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game Controller Highly Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game Controller Highly Recommended
